actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 + PB slashing damage
actions.name: Shred

languages: understands the languages its owner speaks
name: Beast of the Sky

specialTraits.description: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach
specialTraits.name: Flyby

specialTraits.description: You can add the beast owner's proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes
specialTraits.name: Primal Bond
